casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Cappella, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al.; MSL Industries, Inc., Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Cappella v. Indus. Comm. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 23.]

(No. 00-827 Submitted November 14, 2000 Decided January 24, 2001.) Willacy, LoPresti & Marcovy and Timothy A. Marcóvy, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
